Package com.abmash.core.browser.waitcondition

Provides classes to wait for certain events or conditions in order to properly react to changes (AJAX, Websockets, etc.).

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ElementHasTextWaitCondition
    condition for wait driver which checks the text of an element
    ElementWaitCondition
    condition for wait driver which checks the text of an element
    JavaScriptEvaluatedWaitCondition
    condition for wait driver which evaluates a given javascript expression

Package com.abmash.core.browser.waitcondition Description

Provides classes to wait for certain events or conditions in order to properly react to changes (AJAX, Websockets, etc.).
